channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scott Galloway says the key to landing jobs is be as social as possible: ‘70% of the time, the person they pick is someone with an internal advocate’
item.description: “You want to be placed in rooms of opportunities where you’re not physically there,” the NYU Stern School of Business professor said.

item.title: In Chasing Biological Efficiency, Innovators Are Turning To “Analog”
item.description: Biology-inspired, silicon-based computing may boost AI efficiency; AMP2 instead uses AI to accelerate anaerobic biology.

item.title: Apple iOS 26.3 Release Date: Next Critical iPhone Update Is Almost Here
item.description: The next iPhone update is due within weeks, with plenty of key changes. Here’s what’s coming and when.

item.title: LG Unveils New UltraGear Evo 5K Gaming Monitor Range, Including MiniLED, Ultra-Wide, Big-Screen And OLED Options
item.description: New range builds on LG’s 4K and 5K2K gaming display successes with a 52in ultra-wide screen, a 39in OLED and a 27in miniLED display with thousands of ...

item.title: Cisco’s top exec and Amazon’s Andy Jassy share the same hiring red flag—and it’s something that can’t be taught
item.description: It’s not what you know, or even who you know. According to Cisco’s new U.K. chief, your next promotion might hinge on your attitude.

item.title: Kennedy Center seeks $1 million in damages from musician who canceled performance after Trump name added to building
item.description: The law explicitly prohibits the board of trustees from making the center into a memorial to anyone else, and from putting another person’s name on th...

item.title: After U.S. debt soared to $38 trillion, the ‘easy times’ are now over as hedge funds jump into the bond market, former Treasury official warns
item.description: Hedge funds have doubled their presence in the Treasury market in the last four years.

item.title: Peter Thiel and Larry Page are preparing to flee California in case the state passes a billionaire wealth tax, report says
item.description: The proposal calls for California residents worth more than $1 billion to pay a one-time tax equivalent to 5% of their assets.

item.title: Samsung Eyes Galaxy S26 Price Increase Before New Release Date
item.description: The Galaxy S26 is facing a price increase as costs surge. Samsung is hoping to keep costs down with its new Exynos 2600 chip and a later release date.

item.title: Google Rushes Out Urgent Update For Over A Million Pixel Phones
item.description: A new update has just landed for Pixel phones. If you have any Pixel released in the last five years, and you’re on the latest Android 16 beta, you ne...

item.title: A humanoid-robot revolution is coming, but here's why it will take a while
Logan Paul bought a Pokémon card for $5.3M. Should you invest in collectibles?
What are the hottest tech stocks for 2026? Here’s what ChatGPT and Gemini said
Target’s battered stock gets a lift after reported investment from Toms Capital
How the New Year’s tax deadline poses a risk for gold, silver and the Dow
$400k shipment of live lobsters hijacked en route to Midwest Costco locations
item.description: The FBI is investigating the theft of a $400,000 lobster delivery bound for Costco locations in Illinois and Minnesota that was allegedly hijacked.

item.title: Jack in the Box shut down more than 70 stores with more expected by year's end over financial struggles
item.description: Jack in the Box is closing dozens of restaurants as part of a major cost-cutting plan, with 72 locations shuttered so far and more expected in the nea...

item.title: Holiday barks sold at Aldi recalled over potential undeclared pecans, wheat: FDA
item.description: Silvestri Sweets recalled Choceur-branded holiday bark sold at Aldi stores after a packaging mix-up led to undeclared allergens in the popular treats.

item.title: Mortgage rates fall ahead of Christmas holiday
item.description: The average rate on a 30-year fixed mortgage fell this week to 6.18%, according to the latest Freddie Mac data released on Wednesday. That is down fro...

item.title: Where you can shop for your last-minute Christmas needs
item.description: Need last-minute holiday essentials? Find out which major retailers like Target have modified hours on Christmas Eve and will close for the holiday.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
